planScope: This plan covers all aspects of the business, including operations, IT, and finance.
planObjectives: Ensure the continuity of critical business functions.
Minimize the impact of disruptions on customers and stakeholders.
Protect the company's reputation and brand.

planComponents.componentDescription: This component focuses on preventing disruptions from occurring.
componentObjectives: Conduct regular training and awareness programs.

componentActions.actionDescription: This action will involve identifying and assessing potential risks to the business.
This action will involve implementing controls to mitigate risks to the business.

planComponents.componentDescription: This component focuses on detecting disruptions as early as possible.
componentObjectives: Establish a monitoring system to detect disruptions.
Develop procedures for responding to disruptions.
Conduct regular testing of the monitoring system.
